examples.example: 最近我的生活充满了惊喜和欢乐。

translate.english: Recently my life is full of surprises and joys.

examples.example: 最近我交到了很多志同道合的朋友，真的很开心。

translate.english: Recently I have made a lot of like-minded friends, and I am really very happy.

examples.example: 最近我在工作上取得了很大的进步，感到特别自豪。

translate.english: Recently I have made great progress in my work and feel extremely proud.
